text.textblock: Defense Federal Acquisition Regulation Supplement; North American Free Trade Agreement Implementation Act

action.textblock: Interim rule; extension of comment period.

summary.textblock: The Department of Defense published an interim rule on January 10, 1994, (59 FR 1288). This document extends the close of the comment period from February 9, 1994 to March 11, 1994.

date.textblock: Comments on the interim DFARS rule should be submitted in writing to the address shown below on or before March 11, 1994, to be considered in the formulation of a final rule. Please cite DFARS Case 93-D310 in all correspondence related to this issue.

address.textblock: Interested parties should submit written comments to The Defense Acquisition Regulations Council, ATTN: Mrs. Alyce Sullivan, OUSD (A&T)DP(DAR), IMD 3D139, 3062 Defense Pentagon, Washington, DC 20301-3062. Telefax number (703) 697-9845.

signjob.textblock: Deputy Director, Defense Acquisition Regulations Council.
